definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: to toss or throw (in a volume), scatter abundantly (NH id.; Aram. [[זְרַק]] id., zraq disperse; As. zarâḳu Lotz:TP138 Jäger:BAS ii. 292 Anm. **; cf. also Ar. zaraqa cast at, pierce, zar=a0qah;un and mizra0qun  javelin = Eth. mzr4q:)—
toss (in handfuls, v. Ex 9:8; or from a bowl, [[מִזְרָק]]; opp. [[הִזׇּה]] to sprinkle with the finger):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: cummin Is 28:25, dust, sq. [[עַל]] 2Ch 34:4, Job 2:12, ashes [[השׁמימה]], heavenward, Ex 9:8, Ex 9:10 (P), coals of fire [[על העיר]] Ez Eze 10:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: blood, [[מזבה]]([[ה]])[[על ]] throw (from a bowl) against the altar Ex 24:6 (JE), Le 17:6 (H), Nu 18:17 (P), 2Ki 16:13, 2Ki 16:15, Ez Eze 43:18, esp. in the ritual, [[על חמזבת סביב]] against the altar round about Ex 29:16, Ex 29:20, Le 1:5, Le 1:11, Le 3:2, Le 3:8, Le 3:13, Le 7:2, Le 8:19, Le 8:24, Le 9:12, Le 9:18 (all P); sq. [[על העם]] Ex 24:8 (JE), sq. [[המזבחה]] 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:22; without designation of place Le 7:14 (P), 2Ch 30:16, 2Ch 35:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: water for purification, sq. [[על]], Ez Eze 36:25.
intrans. (si vera l.) Ho 7:9 [[גַּם שֵׂיבָה זׇֽרְקָה בּוֹ]] grey hairs are profuse upon him (? rd. [[זׇֽרְחָה]], as in 2Ch 26:19).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[זׁרַק]], of water of purification poured over ([[עַל]]) one defiled by a corpse Nu 19:18, Nu 19:20 (P).
